comments.body:
In the case when no known camera model is defined (I believe this can happen if the user forgot to configure), no obvious message will be shown, only some missing symbols errors.

Can you please add an `#else` clause at the end with an error message using the `#error` macro ? (Something like `#error Camera model is not configured`).
@fredrec thank you for reviewing, Actually the default module is WROVER_MODULE, so it will be always selected in `Kconfig`. but anyways, I will add the necessary changes to make it foolproof.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +164,168 @@#error "No camera module configured, please configure respective module in menuconfig"
#endif

#define XCLK_FREQ       20000000
